# Example 1

```{r}
fn_model <- "
  data {
    int<lower=0> N;
    vector[N] y;
  }

  parameters {
    real mu;
    real<lower=0> sigma;
  }

  model {
    y ~ normal(mu, sigma);
    mu ~ normal(0, 1000);
    sigma ~ exponential(.0001);
  }
"

fn_sim <- stan(model_code = fn_model, 
               data = list(N=2, y = c(-1,1)), 
               chains = 4, iter = 1000*2, seed = 84735)
```


```{r}
ui_model <- "
  data {
    int<lower=0> N;
    vector[N] y;
  }

  parameters {
    real alpha;
    real beta;
    real<lower=0> sigma;
  }

  model {
    y ~ normal(alpha + beta, sigma);
    alpha ~ normal(0, 1000);
    beta ~ normal(0, 1000);
    sigma ~ exponential(1);
  }
"

ui_sim <- stan(model_code = ui_model, 
               data = list(N=100, y = rnorm(100)), 
               chains = 4, iter = 1000*2, seed = 84735)
```
